children.text: The sink has not been fully sealed to the benchtop.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 10.09 Sealing around benches and items installed in benches, states that
‘Seals around items such as sinks, hand basins or the like are defective if the joint leaks or they are not installed in accordance with the manufacturer’s installation requirements’ .
These gaps must be sealed in accordance with the above requirement to avoid water that may leak and damage the joinery or other building elements.
